expo.name: Book&Play
expo.description: The ultimate futsal booking app for players and venue owners

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to find nearby futsal venues and provide accurate directions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to find nearby futsal venues and provide accurate directions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for venue listings and user profiles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images for venue listings and user profiles.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for voice messages in the chat feature.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to help you find friends who also use the app.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share images in venue listings and profiles.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for venue listings and profiles.
